content: s u z y r a i gift knits tutorial chunky twist headband you will need 1 x 100g ball rowan big wool or similar super chunky yarn 1 pair 10mm knitting needles gauge using 10mm needles and working in k1 p1 rib cast on 15 stitches using knit 1st row then work 46cm in fold band in half placing 10mm needles end of top half over centre k1 p1 rib or length that fits stitch 7th stitch of the comfortably around your head bottom half cast off knitwise fold this side fold this under the side over bottom the top stitch in place keep the seam as flat as ét voilà possible once all ends are sewn in turn the band inside out
